website_summaries.verdict: A lip gloss that is easy to apply and looks great.
pros: Comes in 18 warm, natural colors with a slight sparkle
Made with lemon peel, tangerine, and pomegranate for a nice taste on your lips
Can be applied several times a day
cons: Some users claim the product caused their lips to become dry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lip Gloss
customer_reviews.text: My family says I am addicted to Lip Gloss so the frequency with which I apply it is no reflection on the lip gloss. I am allergic to many things including makeup and this lip gloss is wonderful. I love the Nectar color! It is difficult to find warm colored lip glass. This perfect with all the warm colors I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Not gooey like most lip glosses
customer_reviews.text: First -- prompt delivery. I was hesitant to buy my J.I. on Amazon but we have Prime so I thought I'd give it a try... not disappointed. Product Review: I have fallen in love with all J.I. products. I pair this gloss in Kir Royale with the Kaylee PureMoist Lipstick. I love the color combo because it's natural even on my fair skin tone and hair color. I also love the texture of this product compared to all other glosses I have tried. There is some sparkle but it's not over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Igwe

customer_reviews.title: Tube picture is accurate, not lips picture.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! The crabapple color is what it looks like in the picture of the actual tube. The picture of what it looks like on a person's lips seems like a much lighter shade than what the gloss really looks like when applied. There is a hint of orange in the color. If your complexion is a bit orange-toned like mine, it doesn't look very good.
customer_reviews.author: Alison C. Skjei

customer_reviews.title: you can be the judge if you'd like. I'll be going to my local approved Jane ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear this shade all of the time and have owned many, many tubes of this very color... I don't think this is authentic. The packaging looks the same but the color in the tube is slightly off and the color on my lights is much different. The consistency and feel on my lips is way off. I have no proof other then the color and the feeling.... you can be the judge if you'd like. I'll be going to my local approved Jane Iredale retailer for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love Jane Iredale Puregloss Lip Glosses
customer_reviews.text: I love Jane Iredale Puregloss Lip Glosses. They wear well, moisturize and are made of great ingredients. I wear the Candied Rose shade for everyday. The Crabapple shade is a warm red; nice for the holidays. I do wish she had a more neutral red.
customer_reviews.author: treehugger22

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gloss
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on. This lip gloss is not smelly or sticky. It does not irritate my lips like some cheaper brands. The colors are beautiful on -- it goes on fairly thick so you get a good color/look.
customer_reviews.author: Wyogirl

customer_reviews.title: happy with my lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: goes on smoothly, newly improved application tip was a nice plus! Great coverage and color.
customer_reviews.author: Pure Hearted Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Like this lip gloss in crabapple
customer_reviews.text: Like this lip gloss in crabapple. Love when ordering you can adjust the skin tone and change lip colors to "see it on" It looks exactly as shown in the picture. It feels a little sticky on application but not so much after a minute or so. Only other problem I had was if I store it in my makeup bag on its side some of the gloss was squeezing out when I closed the lid after use getting on my hands and wasting gloss. This resolved when I stand it upright in my organizer on the counter between uses. Otherwise pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawn White

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected...Beach plum is the perfect lip color for me. (I wear Radiant foundation with bronzer, and have auburn hair) The feel of this gloss on your lips is creamy and soft. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Package leaks, but it is worth it!!  Love this lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, however, the package leaks consistently and has ruined the inside of a couple of purses. I now have to keep it inside a Ziploc bag inside my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and product
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and product, however I am troubled about it not being sealed in someway. That definitely bothers me! Makeup should be sealed to insure that it is NOT contaminated.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. Only bad thing is that the "gold cap" came off, leaving with me a fairly ugly plastic end to the applicator now. Would give five stars if that hadn't happened (I barely used it).
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and stays on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: If you like gloss, then this is for you. I use it about three times a day, it moistens my lips and it's shiny but limited color. Great for summer. I really like this product and I have bought in another color.
customer_reviews.author: TDailey

customer_reviews.title: One of the nicer glosses.
customer_reviews.text: Love Jane iredale's glosses and this is no exception. Moist without being sticky. I got this in Pink Smoothie, which is a light peachy pink with some sparkle and otherwise mostly clear. Very nice formula.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecamyth

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture and ever so subtle sparkle in it
customer_reviews.text: Wow factor. Love the texture and ever so subtle sparkle in it. Super moisturizing. Just make sure you pick the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: awesome lip gloss~
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my purchase of this lip gloss. It was not sticky and had a pleasant taste. It was very moisturizing and the color is natural and beautiful. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this color many times. I love it. The color is discontinued however. :(
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color, flattering -- use it with liner to increase the richness of color, use it alone for a subtle pink-plum gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing and long-lasting....
customer_reviews.text: The best! I love a lip gloss that's really thick and gooey but stays on! And I know the products are made with non-toxic ingredients. Great colors. The only downside is that it can get a little sticky in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Black Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lipgloss -- no sticky!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss! Beautiful color. I am glad it's sold here!
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Skin refunded my purchase of a Jane Iredale Ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Skin refunded my purchase of a Jane Iredale Ice Mocha lip gloss as the product leaked from the cap.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice when 1st applied but doesn't stay on very long. Needs to be applied several times during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I don't wear anything except moisturizer with sunscreen and Chapstick with spf so I found this to be attractive but too sticky for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be a bit lighter
customer_reviews.text: A bit darker then shown online. Now that I have a bit of a tan it looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Don't gloss it over, this lip color is TOPS!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss. If I could be a local distributor of this product, I would do so with passion and enthusiasm. So glad my sister introduced me to this amazing line of products!!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite color in a lovely container and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly and non toxic.
customer_reviews.text: This color is glossy, shiny and pearlescent, but shear so it's not white like "snow"
customer_reviews.author: FRAM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and universally flattering gloss
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! Not sticky or gloopy and this stuff stays on for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this. First, the color is lighter than I was expecting. Secondly, I don't like the soft flat plastic tube it comes in - was expecting a round hard plastic tube. Third, I don't like the small angled sponge applicator. I find it difficult to get enough on where I want it. Probably won't buy again. Also ordered a Vapour Organics lip gloss and like everything about it better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Color is very nice, not too sticky feeling on
customer_reviews.text: Very pale hint of color for a natural or nude look
customer_reviews.author: T. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Goes on rich and moist
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Iredale line recommended to me by my aestetician because I was having allergic reactions even to Almay. This is a lovely, rich feel gloss to apply. I found the color to be more subtle than I expected but nice and natural in appearance. I'm looking for a brick red statement color. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stark

customer_reviews.title: good but glossy.
customer_reviews.text: good . but if you dont like glossy, i'd recommened not to use
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: all products are wonderful. The lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Jane Iredale...all products are wonderful. The lip gloss, looks good, tastes good, not too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: MARLA B.

customer_reviews.title: This lip gloss is great! The only thing I feel is that it's ...
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is great! The only thing I feel is that it's a little to thick for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie P S

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss. I have one in my bathroom, one in my purse and one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this lip gloss and that it has natural ingredients. For some reason my lips chap up after using. It may have a dehydrating or exfoliating ingredient. I wish it didn't make my lips feel flaky after, but it goes on glossy, makes the lips look smooth and hydrated from the outside and the pink hue is glam and girly. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a good product however my personal taste for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is more sticky than I anticipated and I'm not fond of the fruity smell. It seems like a good product however my personal taste for a lip gloss that is less sticky and not such a fruity smell makes this one a no-go for me.
customer_reviews.author: WalkToRun

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best lip gloss I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lip gloss for about 5-6 years now and I refuse to ever use anything else! This is by far the best lip gloss I have ever purchased! I get so many compliments on the color....I'll seriously cry if they ever discontinue this color!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dugas

customer_reviews.title: This "Rasberry" color is more of a muddy nude with ...
customer_reviews.text: This "Rasberry" color is more of a muddy nude with a hint of red in it. My complexion is fair and I think it might suit someone with a darker complexion.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It is someone sticky like most glosses ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is someone sticky like most glosses but it moistens your lips so it feels good, if that makes sense. My favorite gloss hands down!
customer_reviews.author: 4OSUKIDS

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Crabapple for years and this is not the same as the formula that I am currently wearing...not a coral base. Is this an original Jane Iredale or a knock off? Will compare to a local retailer and then most likely return as I didn't get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as wonderful as I expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has raved about Jane Iredale products for years. When I saw this recommended in a magazine and found it online for a good price I thought,,,,,lets try it. I am not certain that I like the texture and the color is not as universal as the magazine suggested but it does leave my lips with nice moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and there was no lip gloss in it, they were both dried out. I wanted to return it but was not able to because the time was up even tho I just bought it a month ago. I've bought these from Jane Iredale before and they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: christine miloscia

product_meta.title: PureGloss Lip Gloss Original Formula
product_meta.description:
PureGloss Lip Gloss .23 Oz. Snow Berry. Treat your lips with this hydrating and nourishing lip gloss!

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
